LanguageData.VFE_PlanterBox_Tilable.label: модульний ящик для розсади
LanguageData.VFE_PlanterBox_Tilable.description: Вирощує рослини в ящику з ґрунтом. Не потребує електрики для роботи.\n\nМоже бути сконструйована в будь-якій бажаній формі.
LanguageData.VFE_PlanterBox_Tilable_Blueprint.label: tilable planter box (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_PlanterBox_Tilable_Frame.label: tilable planter box (building)
LanguageData.VFE_PlanterBox_Tilable_Frame.description: Grows plants in a box of soil. Does not require power to work.\n\nCan be constructed in any desired shape.
LanguageData.VFE_Hydroponics_Tilable.label: модульний гідропонний басей
LanguageData.VFE_Hydroponics_Tilable.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.\n\nThis version is modular and can be assembled in any shape necessary.
LanguageData.VFE_Hydroponics_Tilable_Blueprint.label: tilable hydroponics basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Hydroponics_Tilable_Frame.label: tilable hydroponics basin (building)
LanguageData.VFE_Hydroponics_Tilable_Frame.descriptio: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.\n\nThis version is modular and can be assembled in any shape necessary.
LanguageData.VFE_Ecosystem_Tilable.label: модульна штучна екосистема
LanguageData.VFE_Ecosystem_Tilable.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial, sealed ecosystem which can be configured to effectively grow even picky plants. Requires a high amount of power to work; plants will die if power is cut. Contains a built-in sun lamp to provide light for the plants.\n\nThis version is modular and can be assembled in any shape necessary.
LanguageData.VFE_Ecosystem_Tilable_Blueprint.label: tilable artificial ecosystem (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Ecosystem_Tilable_Frame.label: tilable artificial ecosystem (building)
LanguageData.VFE_Ecosystem_Tilable_Frame.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial, sealed ecosystem which can be configured to effectively grow even picky plants. Requires a high amount of power to work; plants will die if power is cut. Contains a built-in sun lamp to provide light for the plants.\n\nThis version is modular and can be assembled in any shape necessary.
